rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: BGSEQ

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89960

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in BGTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in BGTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). BGTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
datasetVariables.label: Test Short Name
datasetVariables.name: BGTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89959

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for BGTESTCD. The value in BGTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Test Name
datasetVariables.name: BGTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: BGORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology (http://www.cdisc.org/terminology) list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: BGORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from BGORRES in a standard format or standard units. BGSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be submitted in numeric format in BGSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: BGSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of BGSTRESC. BGSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: BGSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for BGSTRESC and BGSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: BGSTRESU

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate when a test is not done or result is missing. Should be null if a result exists in BGORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: BGSTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BG.BGENDY

self.title: Study Day of End of Weight Interval

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the end of the weight interval, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of End of Weight Interval
datasetVariables.name: BGENDY

description: Body weight gain is the actual difference between two body weight measurements for any given interval for a subject. This is most commonly shown as the difference between two consecutive body weight measurements. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95083, 2018-06-29)
label: Body Weight Gains
name: BG
